items.sentence: You ought to let Tom know Mary is going to do that.
You know that Tom is a friend of Mary's, don't you?
Tom didn't know Mary was studying French with John.
I think that Tom will ask Mary to do that for John.
Tom assumed Mary knew why John was in the hospital.
Both Tom and Mary know it wasn't John who did that.
Tom said he felt uncomfortable and wanted to leave.
Tom asked me where I was planning to go to college.
Tom didn't have enough money to buy what he wanted.
The only country Tom has ever gone to is Australia.
